Name: Line of War
About the game: Line of War - is a classic 3D shooter with surviving elements where the story of one military man during the Vietnam War is told. June, 1965. You are a soldier, John, who has stayed alone among endless Vietnam jungles. He has one purpose is to survive in the hell. You have to clean locations from endless enemies and look for different ammos, keys that allow you to do the next level. You will have various guns including a pistol and a minigun.They will help you to resist enemies. Explore locations, kill enemies, save munitions and be sure you wonâ€™t be bored!
